name: Initial Drift (Brandon Kearns, ScarletScarves)
description:
Drift through an endless eurobeat wonderland in Initial Drift!

***Try Hardware Acceleration if performance is less than expected

***Known issues with Safari

Credits:

Game created by:
  • Brandon Kearns -- Programmer & Designer
  • Kiara Yupangco -- UI Artist

All 3D Assets are made by Kenney (https://www.kenney.nl/)

  • 3D Sports Car is made by donnichols via Turbosquid (https://www.turbosquid.com/3d-models/3d-sports-car-cartoon-model-1505597)

Fonts used:

  • Alarm Clock by David J Patterson via dafont.com (https://www.dafont.com/alarm-clock.font)
  • Blue Highway by Typodermic Fonts via dafont.com (https://www.dafont.com/blue-highway.font)

BG Music is Deja Vu (2019 Instrumental) composed by Dave Rogers
